questions.question_text: You are responsible for security at a building that has a lot of traffic. There are even a significant number of non-employees coming in and out of the building. You are concerned about being able to find out who is in the building at a particular time. What is the simplest way to accomplish this?

choices.B: Have all people entering the building use smart cards for access.
choices.A: Implement a sign in sheet at the main entrance and route all traffic through there.

comments.content:
A sign in sheet is very cost effective and can be implemented immediately. Put at a

Answer option B is incorrect. To begin with this solution would entail significant costs. Furthermore, it would be difficult to implement for nonemployees entering the building.

D. Service-oriented architecture
